constituent: put up (a notice), finger, fingers, mexican bandit, muchacho, siesta, sun, day, aroma, bound up, spoon, sitting on the ground
myStory: xuất bản. tay đưa ra lý do tại sao, thế nào, điều muốn hỏi
words:
掲げる(かかげる): to publish, to print, to carry (an article), to put up, to hang out, to hoist, to fly (a sail), to float (a flag)
掲載(けいさい): appearance (e.g. article in paper)
掲示(けいじ): notice, bulletin
